name: Touhou: Dance of the Inverted Heart
name_original: Touhou: Dance of the Inverted Heart
description:
When Seija discovers the Miracle Mallet, she realizes that she needs to find an Inchling to use it. What follows is a war between the mind and the heart.

Features:
-A fully fleshed out narrative that weaves in and out of Touhou canon.
-Pretty artwork drawn by D.J. Thunderheart.
-Seven different composers who each lend their own style to the game.
-Minigames inbetween important story sections.

Controls:
-Z to advance on the menu and in some minigames
-The arrow keys to move in some minigames
